short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Monitors for the Still Listening dialog on Pandora.com and clicks the Keep Listening button automatically.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Yes I am still listening!  This extension will immediately click the "I'm still listening" button automatically with no interruptions when listening to music pandora.com.  No funny business, ads, tracking, or tricks. 

Free to try, $0.99 to buy.  It is guaranteed to work or your money back, promise!

https://www.still-listening.com/
